栜字的基本解释

栜
sè
古书上说的一种树。

栜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sè］
［《廣韻》山責切，入麥，生。］
(1)木名。即桋。
(2)树枝向上生长。
[②]［cì］
［《集韻》七賜切，去寘，清。］
楣属。

栜字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　栜； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页522第18
【廣韻】山責切【集韻】色責切，?音摵。【說文】桋也。【爾雅·釋木註】赤栜皮理錯戾，叢生山中，中車輞，白栜爲大木。　又【集韻】蘇谷切，音?。亦栜木。可爲車輞。　又霜狄切，音息。義同。　又七賜切，音刺。楣屬。

栜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
栜字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树。

栜
Basic explanation of words
栜
sè
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
栜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sè]
["Guangyun" Mountain blames cuts, enters wheat, and gives birth. ]
(1) Wooden name. That is 桋.
(2) The branches grow upward.
[②]［cì］
["Ji Yun" Qi Ci cut, set, clear. ]
Lintel.
栜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wooden Word Department] 　栜; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 522 18
[Guang Yun] Mountain Responsibility to Cut [Ji Yun] Color Responsibility to Cut,? Sound. [Said the text] 桋 also. [Erya·Shimu's Note] The red bark of the skin is wrong, clustered in the mountains, the middle of the car rim, and the white bark is a big wood.　[Jiyun] Su Guqie, sound?. Also Sakura. Can be a car rim.　Frosty Diche again, sound. The same meaning.　 Seven gift cuts again, sound stab. Lintel.
